content.question: An object of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is moving along a horizontal surface with a speed <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math> when it experiences a resistive variable force <math alttext="F equals negative A x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>âˆ’</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>x</mi></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>A</mi></math> is a positive constant with appropriate units and <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> is the displacement. Which of the following expressions correctly describes the distance the object travels before coming to rest?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator m v sub 0 squared, and denominator 2 A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator m v sub 0 squared, and denominator A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mi>A</mi></mfrac></msqrt></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator m v sub 0 squared, and denominator 2 A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator m v sub 0 squared, and denominator A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mi>A</mi></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator m v sub 0 squared, and denominator A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mi>A</mi></mfrac></msqrt></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
